title: What does this selector does: header > div
answer_1: Change all the divs inside the header
answer_2: Change the header that has a class div inside
answer_3: Change all the divs that are direct children to the header
right_answer: Change all the divs that are direct children to the header

title: What does this selector does: header ~ div
answer_1: Change all the divs inside the header
answer_2: Change the header that has a class div inside

answer_4: Change all the divs that are direct children to the header
right_answer: Change all the divs that are direct siblings to the header
